attributes.action: Cancel all homework for primary and secondary schools
attributes.additional_details: I believe that there is not much point in homework because I think that school should be for education and leaning and home should for relaxation and downtime.
attributes.background: I believe that school is for learning, not home so I think it would be a good idea to start introducing less and less homework in all schools until there is little to no homework in primary and secondary schools

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Ban homework in all schools" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742337
